trends: There have been no other sightings in Rocky Fork lake (Rainsbor
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI wanted to email you while I remembered: (I seem to keep forgetting) Last night me and my 11 year old daughter were going to the store (Joey's pizza) and I looked up first while driving and saw a very large triangular shape, gold in color, dropping out of the clouds. It was V shaped. Then after that on the other side of the sky was a multicolored same shape Object (very large). I didn't get the chills looking at that one that I got with the first. It was amazing! My daughter saw it also. This is not the first time I have seen a UFO. I made it in the UFO magazine 16 years ago. It was about this time of year I saw it then. Same shape. Just a'lot bigger this time. My daughter said I should have taken a picture with my phone, but it just didn't enter my mind at the time I was seeing it. I have told no one about this, but I am positive other's would have had to have seen it also, it was very large in size.
